name: sedata
description: Get security data(China market only for now)

scripts.cup: coffee -bcmo lib/ src/ & git commit -am 'modified' & git push & cd ..
scripts.cupminor: version minor & coffee -bcmo lib/ src/ & git commit -am 'minor update' & git push & cd ..
scripts.cupmajor: version major & coffee -bcmo lib/ src/ & git commit -am 'major update' & git push & cd ..
scripts.cuppatch: version patch & coffee -bcmo lib/ src/ & git commit -am 'patch update' & git push & cd ..

author: Jigme Ko <jigme1968@gmail.com>
